OUTLINE : This dose-escalation study carboxylesterase-expressing allogeneic neural stem cell . Patients receive carboxylesterase-expressing allogeneic neural stem cell via intracerebral catheter day 1 week 1 ; week 1 3 , week 1 , 2 , 3 ; week 1 , 2 , 3 , 4 . Patients also receive irinotecan hydrochloride intravenously ( IV ) 90 minute day 3 week 1 ; week 1 3 , week 1 , 2 , 3 ; week 1 , 2 , 3 , 4 .
